blogPost.excerpt: A growing list of various types of emails (promotional, newsletter, onboarding, etc.) from the best brands, breaking down and highlighting everything you need to know about each email. Learn how the top brands create their emails!
blogPost.body: A growing list of various types of emails (promotional, newsletter, onboarding, etc.) from the best brands, breaking down and highlighting everything you need to know about each email. Learn how the top brands create their emails!
blogPost.title: Email Spotlights - The best brand emails, annotated.
blogPost.author: Alec Beglarian

localize.description: 来自最佳品牌的各种类型的电子邮件（促销、通讯、入职等）的不断增长的列表，分解并突出你需要知道的关于每封电子邮件的一切。了解顶级品牌如何创建他们的电子邮件!
來自最佳品牌的各種類型的電子郵件（促銷、通訊、入職等）的不斷增長的列表，分解並突出你需要知道的關於每封電子郵件的一切。瞭解頂級品牌如何創建他們的電子郵件!

previous.excerpt: With Upvoty, you can easily collect and manage all of your customer's feedback. Share your roadmap and communicate updates with the Changelog. Now, all available in Dark mode! 🖤
previous.title: Upvoty Dark Mode - User feedback, roadmap, and changelog in dark mode 🖤

localize.description: 使用Upvoty，您可以轻松收集和管理所有客户的反馈。分享您的路线图，并通过变更日志沟通更新。现在，所有这些都可以在黑暗模式下使用 🖤
localize.tagline: 黑暗模式下的用户反馈、路线图和变更日志 🖤。

localize.description: 使用Upvoty，您可以輕鬆收集和管理所有客戶的反饋。分享您的路線圖，並通過變更日誌溝通更新。現在，所有這些都可以在黑暗模式下使用 🖤
localize.tagline: 黑暗模式下的用戶反饋、路線圖和變更日誌 🖤。

next.excerpt: Switch off. Slow down. Sundayy is the mindfulness based social network designed to be checked just once a week. Sundayy represents spending time away from feeds, thinking deeper about our days, and sharing what matters with the people who matter.
next.title: Sundayy - The social network you check once a week, on Sunday.

localize.description: 关掉。慢下来。Sundayy是基于心灵的社交网络，设计为每周只需检查一次。Sundayy代表着花时间远离feeds，深入思考我们的日子，并与重要的人分享重要的事情。
localize.tagline: 你每周都要检查一次的社交网络，在周日。

localize.description: 關掉。慢下來。Sundayy是基於心靈的社交網絡，設計爲每週只需檢查一次。Sundayy代表着花時間遠離feeds，深入思考我們的日子，並與重要的人分享重要的事情。
localize.tagline: 你每週都要檢查一次的社交網絡，在週日。
